title: Docker and system monitoring
description: A simple overview of the most important Docker host and container metrics. (cAdvisor/Prometheus)

targets.expr: sum(100 - ((container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{name=~".+", job="localprometheus"} - container_memory_usage_bytes{name=~".+", job="localprometheus"})  * 100 / container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{name=~".+", job="localprometheus"}) ) by (name)
